name: hot_trending_songs_powered_by_twitter
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetch the HOT TRENDING SONGS POWERED BY TWITTER chart information for a specific date and range using the Toolbench RapidAPI key.

date.description: The date for which to fetch the chart information, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

range.description: The range of the chart, with a maximum value between 1-20.
